member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.CollapsePanels
member.summary: Required HTML content to set CollapsePanel as .

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether all the rendered HTML elements should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.CollapsePanelCount
member.summary: Returns the number of int the given `Accordion`.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.CollapsePanelItems
member.summary: Returns all the reference added to the group. It can be used for activating any of the panels.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.ActiveCollapsePanel
member.summary: Returns currently active element ref also can be used to set which panel should be Expanded "active".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.OnCollapsePanelChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when other CollapsePanel activated. Active CollapsePanel is the callback parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.Accordion.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.CommonHeader
member.summary: Common header for Collapse control it will be shown for any collapsed state. It overrides ExpandedHeaderContent, CollapsedHeaderContent.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.ExpandedHeaderContent
member.summary: Special header for Collapse control it is shown when item Expanded.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.CollapsedHeaderContent
member.summary: Special header for Collapse control it is shown when item Collapsed.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.Content
member.summary: HTML Content of the collapse panel.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.ExpandedColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when tab is Active. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.CollapsedColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when tab is not the Active tab. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.HoverColor
member.summary: Sets the `style` of the `background-color` when button is hovered over with mouse. Use HTML specified: **Color Names**, **RGB**, **HEX** or with **HSL** values.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.ContentHeight
member.summary: Sets the height of Content panel in `px`. 0 is auto.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether all the rendered HTML elements should be disabled or not.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.Collapsed
member.summary: Can be set if panel should be collapsed `true` or expanded `false`.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.Animate
member.summary: Determines to apply CSS animation and transition on Collapse state changes or not. Note: in case of `auto` height some animation won't work.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.ShowContentOverflow
member.summary: Determines whether content overflow is visible (scrollable) or not (hidden).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.OnCollapseChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when panel collapsed or expanded. Collapsed state is the callback parameter.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Collapse.CollapsePanel.AllOtherAttributes
member.summary: Blazor capture for any unmatched HTML attributes.
